DOC.brief_summary: Our primary aim evaluate whether Vitamin D deficiency cause depressive symptom antepartum postpartum depression whether early correction Vitamin D deficiency improve symptom . Our secondary aim evaluate maternal fetal outcome include antepartum , intrapartum , immediate postpartum complication . We also evaluate effectiveness common vitamin D treatment regimen use outside pregnancy .
DOC.brief_title: Is Vitamin D Insufficiency Deficiency Associated With Antepartum Postpartum Depression ?
DOC.detailed_description: Our study recruitment single center pregnant private clinic population . We recruit eligible pregnant woman 20 week 0 day less . On study entry , patient complete demographic survey , vitamin D exposure survey , Edinburgh Postnatal Depression Score ( EPDS ) questionnaire . Baseline vitamin D level obtain use 25 OH D ( vitamin D ) assay . Women find vitamin D deficient/insufficient approach randomization vitamin D3 ( Cholecalciferol ) 50,000 IU/week x 8 week + prenatal vitamin versus placebo + prenatal vitamin . A repeat 25 OH D sample plus vitamin D exposure EPDS questionnaire obtain 24-28 week gestation upon complete treatment . All patient keep maintenance vitamin D delivery ( total vitamin D 800IU/day include prenatal vitamin ) . Delivery 25 OH D sample collect woman . At delivery , woman also complete vitamin D exposure EPDS questionnaires . Maternal fetal outcome data collect patient . As vitamin D sufficient patient , follow vitamin D exposure EPDS questionnaires 24-28 week delivery . A 25 OH D sample obtain delivery woman . Maternal fetal outcome data obtain . For vitamin D deficient woman decline randomization , give vitamin D repletion base preference counsel . We continue follow questionnaire outcomes similarly vitamin D sufficient group .
DOC.criteria: Evaluation Roosevelt Hospital ( Receiving prenatal care St Luke 's Roosevelt Hospital center private physician clinic ) 20w0d gestation . Planned delivery Roosevelt Hospital Labor & Delivery English Spanish speak Nonenglish nonspanish speaking Currently antidepressants/mood stabilize medication Medical comorbidities affect vitamin D absorption metabolism : Bone disease ( osteoporosis , osteomalacia ) ; Malabsorption disorder ( cystic fibrosis , inflammatory bowel disease , rouxeny bariatric surgery ) ; Chronic kidney disease ; Severe liver disease ; Granuloma form disorder ( active tuberculosis , sarcoidosis ) ; Parathyroid disease ; Lymphoma ; HIV HAART medication ; antiseizure medication .
